_comment: Web Crawler Configuration File - TSM Educational Institution Website Crawler
_note: JSON doesn't support comments natively. See CONFIG_DOCUMENTATION.md for detailed explanations.

crawl_settings._comment: Core crawling behavior and request parameters
crawl_settings._base_url_note: Starting URL for the crawler. All crawling begins from this URL.
crawl_settings._max_depth_note: Maximum depth to crawl from base_url. Depth 0 = base_url only, Depth 1 = base_url + direct links, Depth 2 = base_url + direct links + links from those pages. Set to 2 for initial testing to avoid overwhelming the server.
crawl_settings._request_delay_note: Delay in seconds between HTTP requests. Prevents server overload and reduces risk of being blocked. 1.5 seconds is a reasonable balance between speed and politeness.
crawl_settings._timeout_note: Timeout in seconds for each HTTP request. If a page takes longer than this, the request will be abandoned.
crawl_settings._user_agent_note: User-Agent string sent with each HTTP request. Identifies the crawler to the web server. This identifies it as an educational project.

output_settings._comment: File paths and formats for saving crawled data
output_settings._csv_output_path_note: Path where crawled data will be saved in CSV format. Useful for spreadsheet analysis and data manipulation.
output_settings._json_output_path_note: Path where crawled data will be saved in JSON format. Preserves hierarchical structure and is easy to parse programmatically.

visualization_settings._comment: Settings for generating site structure visualizations
visualization_settings._output_path_note: File path where the site hierarchy visualization will be saved as a PNG image.
visualization_settings._figure_size_note: Figure dimensions in inches [width, height]. Larger sizes provide more detail but take longer to render. [20, 12] is good for complex site structures.
visualization_settings._dpi_note: Resolution in dots per inch. Higher DPI produces sharper images but larger file sizes. 300 DPI is print-quality resolution.
visualization_settings._node_size_note: Size of nodes in the network graph visualization. Larger nodes are more visible but may cause overlap in dense graphs.
visualization_settings._colormap_note: Color scheme for the visualization. 'Blues' provides a professional, clean appearance. Other options: 'Reds', 'Greens', 'viridis', 'plasma', etc.

filtering._comment: Rules for filtering which URLs to crawl and which to exclude
filtering._allowed_domains_note: List of domains the crawler is allowed to visit. Only URLs from these domains will be crawled. Prevents the crawler from following external links.
filtering._exclude_extensions_note: File extensions to skip during crawling. These file types are typically not HTML pages and don't contain crawlable links. Excluding them saves time and bandwidth.
